attributes.action: provide full public funding for The Princess Royal Trust for Carers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Princess Royal Trust for Carers has 83 young carers’ services that currently support over 15,500 young carers across the UK.  Government estimates are that there are 175,000 young people under the age of 18 who are engaged in the care of their parents. One in ten of these younsters works for over 50 hours per week in providing care at no cost to the public purse but at great personal cost.

Please vote to give these children their childhood back.

The cost of fully financing the vital work of The Princess Royal Trust for Carers in this area from the public purse is under £2,000,000 per annum.

They provide essential support to, often isolated, children and need funds to supprt and extend their outreach work in support of young people and with schools in helping to identify those in need.


Please support this petition.
